title: What are the differences between the iPhone 12 Pro and the iPhone 12? - Quora

response.answer_text: Both the iPhone 12 and iPhone 12 Pro look pretty much the same.The basic iPhone is made from aircraft-grade aluminum, while the Pro variant is made from stainless steel. The main difference is the cameras - iPhone 12 has a dual camera (wide-angle module and ultra-wide, both 12 megapixels), while the iPhone 12 Pro has a triple camera (wide, ultra-wide, and telephoto, all 12 megapixels) with a LiDAR sensor (laser rangefinder, useful for augmented reality applications). Here is a detailed overview of their feature from a professional photographer's point of view:  The amount of RAM is different - the iPhone 12 has only 4 GB of RAM, while the iPhone 12 Pro has 6 GB. A simple iPhone can be purchased with 64, 128, or 256 GB of flash memory. iPhone 12 Pro comes with 128GB, 256GB, or 512GB storage.

I’m assuming that this question is about the next generation of iPhones. The actual names of those phones hasn’t been verified yet, so it could well be called the iPhone 12 line or even the iPhone 11s line. And even if all of it is accurate and won’t change, your needs or budget could change between now and whether you buy your next phone.
